recent_news: Fuelarts launched AX — the first AI-powered startup accelerator for the creative tech industry (announced 2025)
AX provides AI-driven acceleration roadmap with personalized mentorship and smart investor matching
Fuelarts raising $500K pre-seed to develop the AX MVP, with beta launch planned for Q3 2025
Denis Belkevich is also involved with DualForce Labs — a venture studio building AI products from the ground up
Fuelarts focuses specifically on Creative Tech — intersects with Overture (live music/community platform)
enrichment_data.outreach_angle: Denis just launched AX, an AI-powered accelerator for creative tech. Overture (live music community platform) fits squarely in the creative tech category. Reach out referencing the AX launch and asking whether Overture could be a fit for the program. Even if not a direct AX fit, Denis as a GP in creative tech is a natural investor conversation for Overture. Additionally, Fuelarts' interest in AI-mediated tools makes ATX relevant as a B2B SaaS product for accelerators managing portfolio relationships.
